_sText:
This is a Smash Map that took me a pretty long time to make, this is the best map I have ever made so far...
I think it will do well.
----------
I want to also thank Alice Deejay for the awesome song "Better off Alone"
----------
CTs and Ts spawn on different sides of the map with no weapons, they must survive 1 and a half minutes before advancing on to the knife arena with a song and to knife, and if you choose, to knife above lava.

UPDATE:
8/6/09 = New update to map: Better Lighting , I kind of forgot about the lighting, so its way better now!
